description: Source code for a LitElement-based custom web component 'todo-item' used in a TodoMVC application, defining its styles, properties, rendering logic, and event handling.

classes.name: TodoItem
classes.description: Custom web component class representing a single Todo item with properties, styles, and event handlers.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the HTML template for the Todo item, including checkbox, label, and edit input.

methods.name: #toggleTodo
methods.description: Dispatches an event to toggle the completion status of the todo.

methods.name: #deleteTodo
methods.description: Dispatches an event to delete the todo item.

methods.name: #beginEdit
methods.description: Sets the component into editing mode.

methods.name: #finishEdit
methods.description: Dispatches an event with the updated text and exits editing mode.

methods.name: #captureEscape
methods.description: Handles escape key to abort editing.

methods.name: #abortEdit
methods.description: Resets the input value to the original text if editing is aborted.
